titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the UE National Office Records Relating to District 2 and District 2 Locals, 1936-1994 UE.4.1.2
titlestmt.author: Zachary Brodt and Paige Morfitt.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2021-06-11 09:43:23 -0400.
profiledesc.langusage: Description is written in: English, Latin script.

did.unittitle: UE National Office Records Relating to District 2 and District 2 Locals

origination.label: Creator
origination.corpname: United Electrical, Radio and Machine Workers of America

did.abstract: This series contains files on United Electrical, Radio, and Machine Workers of America (UE) District 2 and its locals collected by the UE national office. Included are correspondence, publications, minutes, and news clippings regarding local strikes, events, and organizing efforts.

odd.head: Previous Citation
odd.p: UE National Office Records Relating to District 2 and District 2 Locals, 1936-1990s, UE.4.1.2, Archives Service Center, University of Pittsburgh

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: UE National Office Records Relating to District 2 and District 2 Locals, 1936-1994, UE.4.1.2, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Notes
scopecontent.p: District 2 of the United Electrical, Radio, and Machine Workers of America (UE) consisted of locals in New England and are now part of the UE's Northeast Region. This series contains files on UE District 2 and its locals collected by the UE national office. Included are correspondence, publications, minutes, and news clippings regarding local strikes, events, and organizing efforts. Most of the correspondence is between UE national officers and district or local officers.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This series has been arranged into two subseries. The first contains records pertaining to District 2. The other subseries contains records pertaining to specific locals within the district, and are further arranged numerically by local number into sections.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: The University of Pittsburgh holds the property rights to the material in this collection, but the copyright may still be held by the original creator/author. Researchers are therefore advised to follow the regulations set forth in the U.S. Copyright Code when publishing, quoting, or reproducing material from this collection without the consent of the creator/author or that go beyond what is allowed by fair use.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of the United Electrical, Radio, and Machine Workers of America in 1975, 1986, 1997, and 2001.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Portions of this collection were originally processed by Archives Service Center staff. This finding aid was completed by Zachary Brodt in 2011 and the container list was added by Zachary Brodt and Paige Morfitt in 2014.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: UE District 2 Records, 1950s-1980s, UE.15.2, Archives & Special Collections, University of Pittsburgh Library System
